in_scope: Major external body parts: head, eyes, ears, nose, mouth, hands, legs, fingers, toes
Five senses: sight, hearing, smell, taste, touch
Sense organs: eyes, ears, nose, tongue, skin
Simple functions: eyes for seeing, ears for hearing, nose for smelling
Tongue for tasting, skin for feeling
Basic body care: washing hands, brushing teeth, bathing
out_of_scope: Internal organs like heart, lungs, brain - Introduced in Class 3
Detailed anatomy - Introduced in Class 4
Skeletal and muscular systems - Introduced in Class 5

in_scope: Family members: mother, father, brother, sister, grandparents
Small family and big (joint) family
Loving and helping each other
Rooms in a house: bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, living room
Basic needs at home: food, clothes, shelter
Household items and their uses
out_of_scope: Extended family relationships in detail - Introduced in Class 2
Types of houses based on materials - Introduced in Class 2
Community and neighborhood - Introduced in Class 2

in_scope: Parts of a plant: root, stem, leaf, flower, fruit
Big plants (trees), small plants (shrubs), very small plants (herbs)
Creepers and climbers
Plants give us food, medicine, shade, oxygen
Watering plants, giving sunlight
out_of_scope: Photosynthesis - Introduced in Class 4
Plant reproduction - Introduced in Class 5
Plant classification in detail - Introduced in Class 4

in_scope: Pet animals: dog, cat, fish, parrot, rabbit
Farm animals: cow, hen, goat, horse, sheep
Wild animals: lion, tiger, elephant, monkey, deer
Animal homes: nest, den, stable, kennel, coop
Animal sounds: bark, meow, moo, roar
Animals that eat plants, animals that eat meat
out_of_scope: Animal classification (mammals, birds, reptiles) - Introduced in Class 3
Animal habitats in detail - Introduced in Class 3
Life cycles of animals - Introduced in Class 4

in_scope: Types: fruits, vegetables, grains, milk, eggs
Food from plants: fruits, vegetables, rice, wheat
Food from animals: milk, eggs, meat, honey
Healthy food: fruits, vegetables, milk
Unhealthy food: too much junk food, sweets
Three meals: breakfast, lunch, dinner
out_of_scope: Nutrients and vitamins - Introduced in Class 4
Digestion - Introduced in Class 5
Food preservation - Introduced in Class 4

in_scope: Uses: drinking, cooking, bathing, washing, watering plants
Sources: tap, well, river, rain, pond
Importance of water for living things
Ways to save water: turn off taps, do not waste
Clean water is safe to drink, dirty water makes us sick
out_of_scope: Water cycle - Introduced in Class 3
Water purification methods - Introduced in Class 4
States of water (ice, steam) - Introduced in Class 2

in_scope: Air is all around us but we cannot see it
We need air to breathe, to live
Wind is moving air
Wind helps fly kites, spin windmills, dry clothes
Clean air is good for health
Smoke and dust make air dirty (pollution)
out_of_scope: Composition of air (oxygen, nitrogen) - Introduced in Class 4
Properties of air - Introduced in Class 3
Air pressure - Introduced in Class 5

in_scope: Weather: sunny, rainy, cloudy, windy, cold, hot
Three main seasons: summer (hot), winter (cold), rainy (monsoon)
Summer clothes: light, cotton clothes
Winter clothes: sweaters, jackets, warm clothes
Rainy season: umbrella, raincoat
Activities: swimming in summer, playing in rain, festivals
out_of_scope: Climate zones - Introduced in Class 4
Weather instruments - Introduced in Class 5
Causes of seasons - Introduced in Class 5

in_scope: Sun gives us light and heat during the day
Sun rises in the morning, sets in the evening
Moon and stars appear at night
Day activities: going to school, playing, studying
Night activities: sleeping, resting
Some animals sleep at night, some sleep during the day
out_of_scope: Rotation of Earth - Introduced in Class 4
Solar system - Introduced in Class 4
Phases of moon - Introduced in Class 3

in_scope: Brushing teeth twice a day
Taking bath daily, washing hands before eating
Cutting nails, combing hair
Road safety: look both ways, hold hands while crossing
Saying please, thank you, sorry
Eating healthy food, drinking water, sleeping on time
Exercise and playing outdoors
out_of_scope: Detailed hygiene science - Introduced in Class 4
First aid - Introduced in Class 5
Disease prevention - Introduced in Class 4
